name: 2200: Discard Dungeon
description:
The web build has audio delay, download if you can!

The year is 2200. . . Artificial Intelligence Overlords have dominated humans --and the entire Galaxy-- for a century. . . But there is one place they have yet to rule: the Space Dungeon. . . Help your robot overlord High-Q conquer this final frontier!

2200: Discard Dungeon is a collaborative card game where you keep a stupid AI from losing... as best you can.

Credits

Palette: Sirens at Night by avianAnnihilator

Fonts: Mini3x5 and Adapa

Some SFX by: f4ngy, NenadSimic

Thanks to Jens for dialog ideas!
Thanks to 2Dspessman for initial brainstorming and inspiration!

This is a submission for Wowie Jam 4.0, shout-out to Jonas Tyroller!
The theme was Collaborate With AI
